  1. Shiki's Modern Haiku Movement
  2. Masaoka Shiki

Masaoka Shiki

A key figure in the modern haiku movement, Masaoka Shiki is credited with transforming haiku into a more serious literary form. He emphasized the importance of capturing the beauty of nature and contemporary life in concise verses.

Posts by Masaoka Shiki
